item.title: Dispute emerges over back pay for furloughed workers
item.description: The 2025 government shutdown entered its seventh day on Tuesday as both sides remained locked in their positions, with no sign of relenting. Follow li...

item.title: Israelis mourn 2 years after Hamas attack as the Gaza war grinds on
item.description: As Israelis come together to mourn those killed two years ago by Hamas, the sounds of the ongoing war in Gaza reverberate over a solemn memorial.

item.title: Excitement — and concerns — over OpenAI's Sora 2 and other AI video tools
item.description: Sora 2 and Meta's "Vibes" feature lets users' imagination run wild in creating online video. That could get messy, tech experts say.

item.title: Flights delayed at some airports amid air traffic controller shortage
item.description: Airports in several U.S. states are seeing flight delays as the government shutdown enters a second week.
